description: Johnny B thinks he's alone in the house, so he busts out his phone to dial up some porn and begins to fondle himself. Little does he know, step-brother Jackson Cooper is hidden in the closet spying on Johnny. When he emerges, the brothers find out they've both been hiding in the closet, and now that their secret is out, Jackson sees no reason not to take advantage of the situation. Johnny is game, so the two of them keep it in the family and engage in a little brotherly bonding. The only question is, will they be able to bust before their parents come home, and how long can they keep their family secret?Enjoy!
title: Hiding Secrets
